title: Only a few days left!!! Enter P22's Playing Card contest!
content: By popular demand, [P22](http://web.archive.org/wiki/P22) is planning to reissuing their popular playing cards, but instead of rerunning the designs as is, we would like to include card designs by all of you! For more info check out [http://www.p22.com/cardcontest.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526123504/http:/www.p22.com/cardcontest.html). Get em in soon!
author: paul d hunt

comments.content:
Clever marketing. Let the idiots do the stuff, sit back and pick the best.  
— [astype.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526123504/http:/www.astype.de/)—

well i guess that’s the pessimists’ take on the subject.

I’d look at it as a chance to get some highly-coveted, well-designed, ultra-snazzy playing cards - _FREE!_ Ya can’t beat that.

I dig the playing cards. The concept was indeed clever marketing, the results highly collectible and fun. I’m happy to see the folks at P22 taking it a step further and making the second edition an even broader collaborative project. Can’t wait to see the new deck!

Hi - new to these forums

Does anybody have one of the P22 decks fro sale or know where I migth find one? Ebay has let to nothing so far. Any help would be greatly appreciated!
